author: Clare
content:
Question for all,
how many coward test were carried out each day? not disclosed.
What is the cost of carrying out the coward test? not disclosed.
The swab are carried out by hospital staff, after that what is the following process? 
Who carry out the final coward test (government or private enterprise)? not disclosed,
How much had been spend on this coward test? top secret? Lets do some guess work say 100,000 test per day at (lowest)average price of rm200/test for 365 days.
We had burned 7.3 trillion on test alone. Who profit from it? not disclosed
Who can enlighten the rakyat of the above?
